oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1958-09-30 Correspondence
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: law; libraries; civil rights; desegregation; Chandler, Walter; Cunningham, Jesse; 1950s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A letter from Librarian Jesse Cunningham to former Mayor Walter Chandler, discussing the organization of a "Friends of the Library" group, programming, collection development and an incident "when four negroes attempted to use the library at McLean and Peabody."
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Cunningham, Jesse
